DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study examine efficacy safety S-555739/cetirizine HCl compare individual component placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Combination Study Of S-555739/Cetirizine HCl In Adult Patients With Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis
DOC.criteria: History diagnosis seasonal allergic rhinitis skin prick test Have nasal symptom score define study protocol Able comply study procedures Any nasal disease abnormality , active respiratory tract infection within past 2 week , recent nasal surgery sinus surgery Screening Use prohibit concomitant drug therapy
